official_title: A bill to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to extend the authority granted by such Act.
short_title: Defense Production Act Extension Amendments of 1979

summary.text: Defense Production Act Extension Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Defense Production Act of 1950 to extend the authority granted in such Act until September 30, 1980.
